title: eurostile light
content:
I was wondering if there is something like eurostile light (similar shapes but lighter)?  
Any alternatives highly appreciated?  
Thank you,  
Marco

 [‹ Alternative to Comic Sans?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033848/http:/typophile.com/node/38389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Site using both serif and sans fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033848/http:/typophile.com/node/38398 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marco

comments.content: Confused by your answer, Scott. He’s looking for something _lighter_ than Eurostile Light. [Stratum](http://web.archive.org/) has Thin and Light weights. Maybe [FF QType](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033848/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_qtype_square_ot/).

Stephen, Thanks, Qtype is definitely a valid alternative.  
Anyone else?
